name: c64 - RetroArch 32 - frodo
description: Supported extensions: d64, lnx, p00, t64, x64, zip.
launcherParams:
-n com.retroarch.ra32/com.retroarch.browser.retroactivity.RetroActivityFuture
  -e ROM {file.path}
  -e LIBRETRO /data/data/com.retroarch.ra32/cores/frodo_libretro_android.so
  -e CONFIGFILE /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/com.retroarch.ra32/files/retroarch.cfg
  -e IME com.android.inputmethod.latin/.LatinIME
  -e DATADIR /data/data/com.retroarch.ra32
  -e APK /data/app/com.retroarch.ra32-1/base.apk
  -e SDCARD /storage/emulated/0
  -e EXTERNAL /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/com.retroarch.ra32/files
  --activity-clear-task
  --activity-clear-top
